selectedVerses.text: O LORD, you are my God; I will exalt you; I will praise your name, for you have done wonderful things, plans formed of old, faithful and sure.
It shall be the most lowly of the kingdoms, and never again exalt itself above the nations. And I will make them so small that they will never again rule over the nations.
Humble yourselves, therefore, under the mighty hand of God so that at the proper time he may exalt you,
All these were the sons of Heman the king's seer, according to the promise of God to exalt him, for God had given Heman fourteen sons and three daughters.
Exalt the LORD our God; worship at his footstool! Holy is he!
